definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to deal a single fatal blow/(fig.) to totally repudiate sb because of a minor error

sentences.english: Last summer, a hailstorm damaged the ten mu of good land.
sentences.chinese: 冰雹毀壞了農作物，甚至打死了牲畜。

sentences.english: Israel says it killed at least 20 guerillas in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 以色列說，以軍在戰鬥中至少打死20名游擊隊員。

sentences.english: Wang Youqin was a student at the Beijing Normal University High School when Ms.
sentences.chinese: 卞女士被打死時，王友琴是在北京師大附中的學生。

sentences.english: An air strike killed five people in a mosque as dusk fell.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時一次空襲打死了清真寺裏的5個人。

sentences.english: Without saying a word, the militiamen shot and killed him.
sentences.chinese: 民兵們二話不說，開槍把他打死了。

sentences.english: He was mowed down by the assassin at point-blank range.
sentences.chinese: 他被暗殺者的近距離開槍打死。

sentences.english: Driver was killed, van overturned on the tracks also.
sentences.chinese: 司機被打死了，囚車也翻倒在鐵軌上。

sentences.english: But I'm not tellin ' you where he went and there's no way you're gonna make me.
sentences.chinese: 但我不會告訴你他去那裏了，就是你打死我我也不說。

sentences.english: We were sitting birds asking to be knocked off.
sentences.chinese: 我們好比一羣馬，坐在那兒等人打死。

sentences.english: Three people were killed by shots fired at random from a minibus .
sentences.chinese: 3個人被從一輛麪包車中發射的亂彈打死了。

sentences.english: He was shot by a misloaded prop gun.
sentences.chinese: 他被裝入真子彈的道具手槍打死。

sentences.english: Liu Chao of Ninghsiang was killed by the peasants.
sentences.chinese: 寧鄉的劉昭，是農民直接打死的。

sentences.english: The mob fell on the killers and clubbed them to death.
sentences.chinese: 亂民兇猛地攻擊殺人者，把他們亂棍打死了。

sentences.english: At least one worker was killed by his captors.
sentences.chinese: 至少有一名奴工被綁架者打死。

sentences.english: Mexican navy kills top cartel kingpin in shootout.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥大毒梟在與海軍交火中被打死。

sentences.english: A nasty guy shot her in the back .
sentences.chinese: 一個齷鹺的傢伙，從背後開槍打死了他。

definition: to hack to death/to kill with an ax
to open fire/to shoot a gun
to run off rebuffed/to fend off/(to fight off and make sb) run off
unable to defeat/to be no match for sb
to execute by firing squad/to shoot dead/fig. to discard/to get rid of
to beat up/to break to pieces
